markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Duergar](/Traits.aspx?ID=53)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup>

Subterranean kin of the [dwarves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=1), duergar typically have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) and immunity to [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126). They are not easily fooled by [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=92).
name: Duergar
